pr_title: Validate missing key expr in invalid member access expressions in parser

timeline.message: Validate missing key expr in invalid member access expressions

timeline.bodyText:
Inside the same method, there seems to be multiple places where we call STNodeFactory.createNodeList(member); with member possibly being null.
Shall we fix those as well? :)
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.message: Handle other places where key expr can be null
